document_data.name: Clan Roaryl
document_data.mainbody: '''Clan Roaryl''' was a noble house of [[Eskorn]], and the ruling dynasty of the kingdom as of [[1479 DR]].
document_data.History: Clan Roaryl was founded by the legendary hero [[Aunglass Roaryl]] after he defeated the dragon [[Eskornamundyr]]. The clan later became the fifth ruling dynasty of Eskorn.
document_data.Known Members:
* Aunglass Roaryl
* [[Ornan Roaryl]]
* [[Imrar Roaryl]]
* [[Flandarr Roaryl]]
* [[Dlorna Roaryl]]
